_comment: Google Form field mapping for Hostel Leave Application Form ID: 1FAIpQLScdAqB_-aEvPRBh4xJVmSPDv9tuYJWFAimPbspKZXwnLHEwFQ
_instructions: To update these mappings: 1) Open the Google Form, 2) Inspect element on each field, 3) Find the 'entry.XXXXXXXXX' value in the name attribute, 4) Update the corresponding mapping below

_notes.email: Required field with email validation and 'Record as email included with response' helper text
_notes.reason: Required textarea field for reason for leave
_notes.leaveFrom: Required date picker field for leave start date
_notes.leaveTo: Required date picker field for leave end date
_notes.leaveCity: Required text field for destination city
_notes.correlationId: Short answer field for tracking submissions between PWA and Google Form
_notes.dateFormat: If Google Form splits dates into separate year/month/day fields, additional mappings will be needed

troubleshooting.401_error: Form may not be public. Go to Form Settings > Responses > ensure 'Restrict to users in <domain>' is unchecked
troubleshooting.validation_error: Check entry IDs match form fields exactly. Use browser inspector on form to verify
troubleshooting.missing_responses: Verify form has linked Google Sheet and check Sheet permissions

_maintenance.howToRefresh: When Google Form is edited: 1) View form source, 2) Copy new entry.* IDs, 3) Update mappings above, 4) Test with sample submission
